verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of Asaph <WH623>. 'Elohim <WH430> standeth <WH5324> <WH8737> in the congregation <WH5712> of the mighty <WH410>; he judgeth <WH8199> <WH8799> among <WH7130> the 'elohim <WH430>.
How long will ye judge <WH8199> <WH8799> unjustly <WH5766>, and accept <WH5375> <WH8799> the persons <WH6440> of the wicked <WH7563>? Selah <WH5542>.
Defend <WH8199> <WH8798> the poor <WH1800> and fatherless <WH3490>: do justice <WH6663> <WH8685> to the afflicted <WH6041> and needy <WH7326> <WH8802>.
Deliver <WH6403> <WH8761> the poor <WH1800> and needy <WH34>: rid <WH5337> <WH8685> them out of the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7563>.

They know <WH3045> <WH8804> not, neither will they understand <WH995> <WH8799>; they walk <WH1980> <WH8691> on in darkness <WH2825>: all the foundations <WH4144> of the earth <WH776> are out of course <WH4131> <WH8735>.
I have said <WH559> <WH8804>, Ye are 'elohim <WH430>; and all of you are children <WH1121> of Ha `Elyon <WH5945>.
But <WH403> ye shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> like men <WH120>, and fall <WH5307> <WH8799> like one <WH259> of the princes <WH8269>.
Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, judge <WH8199> <WH8798> the earth <WH776>: for thou shalt inherit <WH5157> <WH8799> all nations <WH1471>.
